channel.title: Comments for page "Proof Reader"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Proof Reader"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Proof Reader is a special, one-of-a-kind ally created not by McM but a specific group of players, the TFF Alliance as stated in the entry for Proof. As such, he's not necessarily based on anything but the imaginations of the people who paid for his creation.

item.title: Based off of
item.content:encoded:
Every character in BvS is based off of someone. weather they are anime or not.

May I suggest that this is anonymous? Seeing as he has a yellow face instead of a green one, and a suit instead of a black one, but he still has the general appearance.

Plus, we know that BvS has used 4chan before (see: touchy and Pedobear)

item.title: Event find chance?
item.content:encoded: According to the comments on the bottom, Haus and MC Stripeypants give bonuses for finding rare eventsâ€¦ Either that's mistaken, or the pages on those two characters are..
